pull.title: Update libsecp256k1 subtree to release 0.4.0
pull.body: We had previously pulled in a non-released commit along with #27479. The necessary changes have now been released in version 0.4.0, so update to that.

| ---- | --------- |

| Concept ACK | [real-or-random](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28404#pullrequestreview-1609829534), [jonatack](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28404#issuecomment-1705589801) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ðŸ‘Ž to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
ACK 0e0fc18c3cf8c0aa4cca85c4294416463f157870, having a zero diff with my local branch that updates the `secp256k1` subtree up to v0.4.0.
